Description_lang: $?c3[Ravager's damage is reduced by $s1% but it now has $s4 charges and generates ${$s5/10} additional Rage each time it deals damage.][Bladestorm and Ravager's damage are reduced by $s1% but they now have $s4 charges and generate ${$s5/10} additional Rage each time they deal damage.]

description_blz.en_US: Bladestorm and Ravager's damage are reduced by 30% but they now have 2 charges and generate 10 additional Rage each time they deal damage.
description_blz.es_MX: El daño de Filotormenta y Devastador se reduce un 30%, pero ahora tienen 2 cargas y generan 10 p. más de ira cada vez que infligen daño.
description_blz.pt_BR: O Dano de Tornado de Aço e Assolador é reduzido em 30%, mas os dois agora têm 2 cargas e geram 10 a mais de Raiva sempre que causam dano.
description_blz.de_DE: Verringert den Schaden von 'Klingensturm' und 'Verheerer' um 30%, aber die Fähigkeiten haben 2 Aufladungen und erzeugen jedes Mal, wenn sie Schaden verursachen, zusätzlich 10 Wut.
description_blz.en_GB: Bladestorm and Ravager's damage are reduced by 30% but they now have 2 charges and generate 10 additional Rage each time they deal damage.
description_blz.es_ES: El daño de Filotormenta y Devastador se reduce un 30%, pero estas facultades ahora tienen 2 cargas y generan 10 p. de ira más cada vez que infligen daño.
description_blz.fr_FR: Les dégâts de Tempête de lames et Ravageur sont réduits de 30 %, mais les techniques ont désormais 2 charges et génèrent 10 points de rage chaque fois qu’elles infligent des dégâts.
description_blz.it_IT: Riduce i danni inflitti da Tempesta di Lame e Impeto Devastatore del 30%, ma ora hanno 2 cariche e generano 10 rabbia aggiuntiva ogni volta che infliggono danni.
description_blz.ru_RU: Урон от "Вихря клинков" и "Опустошителя" уменьшается на 30%, но количество зарядов этих способностей увеличивается до 2. "Вихрь клинков" и "Опустошитель" дают еще 10 ед. ярости каждый раз, когда наносят урон.
description_blz.ko_KR: 칼날폭풍과 쇠날발톱의 공격력이 30%만큼 감소하지만, 2회 충전되고 피해를 입힐 때마다 10의 분노를 추가로 생성합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 劍刃風暴和劫毀旋刃的傷害降低30%，但現在可使用2次，且每次造成傷害時，額外產生10點怒氣。
description_blz.zh_CN: 剑刃风暴和破坏者的伤害降低30%，但现在可以使用2次，而且每次造成伤害会额外产生10点怒气。
